featured.text: In forested areas with thick tree crowns, there is intense struggle for these resources.
They draw elegant henna crowns on the women’s bare heads to help them 18 the loss of their hair after cancer treatment.
This beautiful phenomenon is called crown shyness.

other.text: Featuring floral patterns, religious symbols, and messages of hope, the painted henna crowns are amazing substitutes for the hats and wigs that the cancer patients would 19 use to cover their heads.
Many women report that the henna crowns really work as a healing device, helping them build a more 20 self-image at a time when they are vulnerable and depressed.
Scientists have been discussing crown shyness since the 1920s, proposing 12 explanations for the phenomenon.
Gaps in the treetops resulting from crown shyness may allow trees to increase their 14 light and enhance photosynthesis.
15 decades of investigation, there is no consensus on exactly what causes the beautiful and mysterious phenomenon of crown shyness.

definition.zh_def: 王冠；象徵君主權力的頭飾。
definition.en_def: A circular ornamental headdress worn by a monarch as a symbol of authority.
definition.example: The queen wore a beautiful crown during the coronation ceremony.
